tax_categories.name: General Pet Supplies
tax_categories.description: Standard pet accessories, toys, grooming tools, and non-consumable merchandise

tax_categories.name: Pet Food & Treats
tax_categories.description: All consumable food products for pets, including dry and wet food, treats, and supplements

tax_categories.name: Veterinary Medications
tax_categories.description: Prescription medications, medical supplies, and veterinary-specific health products

tax_categories.name: Pet Services Digital
tax_categories.description: Online training courses, digital subscriptions, and virtual veterinary consultations

tax_categories.name: Live Animal Sales
tax_categories.description: Direct sales of pets, including adoption fees and breeder listings

tax_categories.name: Shipping & Handling
tax_categories.description: Delivery fees, packaging, and transportation charges for pet supplies

tax_categories.name: Gift Cards & Store Credit
tax_categories.description: Digital and physical gift cards, store credit, and prepaid purchase certificates

tax_categories.name: Pet Insurance
tax_categories.description: Digital insurance products and subscription-based pet health coverage

tax_categories.name: Specialty Pet Equipment
tax_categories.description: Advanced or specialized pet equipment like training devices, mobility assistance, and high-end accessories
